DESCRIPTION: Allows you to edit the settings for one of your mirror channel that you have created..
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}mirroredit [Name] [delete]** ~ Toggles the option whether messages sent by users in the source channel are deleted after copying over to the mirror channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}mirroredit [Name] [anonymous]** ~ Toggles the option whether messages that are copied to the mirror channel should show the real username or a fake name. All fake names will have #0000 and are guaranteed to make you smile :)
VIP_ONLY_GUILD: Customizing the mirror channel setting are only available for VIP guild. To learn how to become a VIP, please use the invite command to join our support server.
NOT_FOUND: I was unable to find any mirror channel setup named **{{name}}**.
DELETED: Deleting the message sent in the source channel has been **{{status}}**.
ANONYMOUS: Randomizing the names for the messages sent to the mirror channel has been **{{status}}**.
